languages.text: "Император защищает, соратни{mf|к|ца}!" {n}Комиссар умело прячет глумливую улыбку под исполненной пафосной гордости гримасой.{/n}
"The Emperor protects, comrade!" {n}The Commissar expertly hides his derisive smile under a grimace of lofty pride.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Император защищает, соратни{mf|к|ца}!" {n}Комиссар умело прячет глумливую улыбку под исполненной пафосной гордости гримасой.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "The Emperor protects, my comrade!" {n}The Commissar expertly hides his derisive smile under a grimace of lofty pride.{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: “愿帝皇保佑你，同志！”{n}政委熟练地摆出一副崇高而骄傲的面孔，将充满嘲弄的笑容隐藏在面孔之下。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Emperor protects, comrade!" {n}The Commissar expertly hides his derisive smile under a grimace of lofty pride.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “愿帝皇保佑你，同志！”{n}政委熟练地摆出一副崇高而骄傲的面孔，将充满嘲弄的笑容隐藏在面孔之下。{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: 「同胞よ、皇帝のご加護を！」{n}コミッサーは嘲笑しているのを感じ取られないように、高慢な笑みを浮かべている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Emperor protects, comrade!" {n}The Commissar expertly hides his derisive smile under a grimace of lofty pride.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「同胞よ、皇帝のご加護を！」{n}コミッサーは嘲笑しているのを感じ取られないように、高慢な笑みを浮かべている。{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: «¡El Emperador protege, camarada!». {n}El Comisario oculta a la perfección su sonrisa burlona bajo una máscara de orgullo noble.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Emperor protects, comrade!" {n}The Commissar expertly hides his derisive smile under a grimace of lofty pride.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡El Emperador protege, camarada!». {n}El Comisario oculta a la perfección su sonrisa burlona bajo una máscara de orgullo noble.{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.original_text: "The Emperor protects, comrade!" {n}The Commissar expertly hides his derisive smile under a grimace of lofty pride.{/n}

languages.text: « L'Empereur protège, camarade ! » {n}Le commissaire dissimule habilement un sourire railleur derrière un air de noble fierté.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Emperor protects, comrade!" {n}The Commissar expertly hides his derisive smile under a grimace of lofty pride.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « L'Empereur protège, camarade ! » {n}Le commissaire dissimule habilement un sourire railleur derrière un air de noble fierté.{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Der Imperator schützt uns, {mf|Kamerad|Kameradin}!" {n}Der Kommissar verbirgt geschickt sein geringschätziges Lächeln unter einer Grimasse hochmütigen Stolzes.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Emperor protects, comrade!" {n}The Commissar expertly hides his derisive smile under a grimace of lofty pride.{/n}

traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "İmparator korur yoldaşım!" {n}Komiser; alaycı gülümsemesini, mağrur ve gururlu yüz hatlarının altında ustaca gizliyor.{/n}
